post.content:
On the second part of my resolution for this year I resolved to implement some type of physical exercise on a regular basis. I have to confess that I have not been doing a very good job at it, but for the last couple of days I’ve been riding the bike. I’m not prepared to categorize my rides as training but it’s a start. I plan to ride the entire 60 miles on Memorial Day weekend, and there is no better time to start than yesterday. Let me rephrase that: the better time to start was (not yesterday) but some time ago.

I do plan to make it to the finish line, but I also plan to have fun doing it. And if you ever rode a bicycle for more than three hours nonstop, you know how much fun it can be. My goal is twofold: enjoy the ride and have enough energy afterwards to have fun with the family. If you are curious as to what I’m talking about, check out this link:Photos in Flickr of 2010 event
